availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Married to Sophia Troutman. Father of Mary E. Troutman, Henry F. Troutman, R. L. Troutman, V. Troutman, Wilhite Troutman, John H. Troutman, Charles. F. Troutman, Emma C. Troutman, Minnie B. Troutman, and Ida B. Troutman.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 795.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 277A
Find A Grave, "Michael Troutman (April 6, 1812-September 2, 1870)," Memorial #37628000, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/37628000 (accessed September 20, 2019).
